name: Datadog
description: Observability platform for metrics, logs, traces, and incident management

tools: search_logs — Search and filter log data

setup_steps: 1. Create API key in Datadog → Organization Settings → API Keys
2. Create Application key with read-only scopes
3. Set DD_SITE based on your region (datadoghq.com, datadoghq.eu, etc.)
4. Store keys in Vault or environment variables
security_notes: Application keys inherit the permissions of the creating user — use a service account
Scope application key to read-only operations
